comment: Take this professor. I'm serious. He's awesome at teaching and he's an incredible person. Latin would be a significantly harder language to learn if it wasn't for Professor Ewing. Seriously, he's awesome.

The best professor I've ever had by far: He's an easy grader, allows you to turn in work prior to the due date for review, and most assignments are not for a grade. He has 3 graded assignments: midterm, final exam, and the final project, all are super easy. Technically attendance is mandatory, but he's very lenient. A bit of a talker, but its fun.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Wonderful professor. He makes learning stress-free and makes you love the language. Extremely personable and is always willing to help. He's also just super sweet!

I haven't even finished his class but I just want everyone to know how amazing this man is. He loves what he does and really does get to know you. There's lots of vocab but if you make a quizlet it makes it a lot easier. He is very relaxed and I have dyslexia and Latin comes very easily. He is very accessible outside of class.

Favorite professor by far. I hated taking language courses in high school but he made it fun. You can tell he has a passion for teaching, as well as every single one of his students. He even got all his students a Starbucks gift card at the end of the semester! Definitely take his class.

I love Dr. Ewing! He is so sweet and he does not give much homework. Attendance is not mandatory and he gives out his personal cell if you ever need to access him. I don't particularly enjoy learning Latin but he's made Latin enjoyable and I may take him again next semester just because he's so wonderful. Lots of extra credit opportunities.

I'm looking back a bit. My son was just given latin as an elective 9th grade. Dr, Ewing is the salt of the earth. I took his classes at night, with this kid as a little kid. Coloring books in tow. Ewing is just awesome, accommodated my kids, and is as wonderful a human as he is a professor. I got a good grade, I worked for it, and take his class.

Dr. Ewing has a passion for Latin Studies. He is very personable and is careful not to overwhelm his students. Epic Poetry also teaches about Roman Life, customs and history of the particular era. This class is a Latin translation class of poets and politicians such as Cicero, Virgil, Catullus... Some translations are done at home, others in groups

I loved Dr. Ewing. He's an amazing professor. Always willing to help, this class was so easy. All you do is read a couple books and discuss them. The rest of the time in class is purely translation. He always goes over the translation with you in class so you know whats right. The final is going to dinner and turning in a copy of the translation.

Dr. Ewing is bar far the most awesome professor at KSU. He loves Latin, and has so many amazing stories to tell which relate to the topic being studied. The material being taught is challenging but becomes easy when he teaches it. He knows how to teach! Take him, you won't regret it :)

Dr. Ewing is a wonderful professor and truly LOVES what he does! Any language course comes with a lot of information but he breaks it down by chapter, making it less stressful. Learn the vocab (make flashcards!) Fun class, tells stories that keep you entertained! When he assigns homework get it done, it helps keep your memory refreshed! Take him!!
Dr. EWING is AWESOMEE!!! Best and funniest teacher ive had in my life!! anyone who doesnt take with him will be missing out on learning and hilarious stories!!

Gregory Ewing is my favorite teacher at KSU. He likes to tell stories, and is a very interesting character. Study your vocab and listen in class and you'll do fine. He made me want to change my major to latin! Latin for the new millennium book and work book required. But you use them in LATN 1002.
I LOVE DR. EWING! He's the best teacher I've had at Kennesaw. Made me enjoy Latin. He's the best!

Super easy to get an A. Magister Ewing is a very nice man and always wants his students to do well. However, I can't say that I learned a lot from his class. In short, it was not a challenging course in the least bit.

I have taken two latin classes with him, and he is AWESOME. super nice, tells funny stories.  really understanding. he grades you on how well you progress throughout the semester. he is a great guy and a really great teacher. 4 tests, drop the lowest one, and 2 other assignments, extra credit opportunities.

I LOVE Dr. Ewing!! I've taken him for 3 Latin classes and have really enjoyed his classes.  He tests you on what you have learned and more or less lets the class pick the pace (which is great in a FL class).  He's really nice and really helpful.  What you learn you learn well!! I HIGHLY reccommend him for anyone!

You'll love Dr. Ewing. He's really nice and grades you on what you've ACTUALLY LEARNED (which will be a lot) not just on attendance or projects. He's helpful and responsive. He also tells gret stories about and likes to laugh.
